abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the
            Polychlorinated Biphenyl (PCB) Management and Disposal
            Demonstration Project is that the China will implement
            policies and measures to identify and demonstrate
            environmentally-sound and cost-effective policies,
            procedures and techniques for safely managing and disposing
            of China's unique temporarily stored PCBs and
            associated PCB-contaminated wastes. The changes include:
            modification of an intermediate results target; and a third
            extension of the grant closing date from December 31, 2011
            until December 31, 2012. These changes are necessary to
            account for initial project implementation delays and
            changes in the actual circumstances identified during
            project implementation. In light of recent progress
            achieved, these changes are to allow the project to complete
            its activities and meet its development objectives.
